Roses

Roses 2015 Preview: Squash

Promotion and loss of players meant the men's team struggled this year, in contrast to solid form in the league and cup from the women's team. History favours the White Rose, and that should continue this year.

Roses 2015 Preview: Lacrosse

It has been another successful year for one of York's powerhouse clubs, as both men's and women's sides have packed a punch after promotion. Expect the Black and Gold to pick up 12 points here.

Roses opening ceremony revealed

The countdown to Roses 2015 begins in earnest as YUSU announce opening ceremony plans

Men's lacrosse fall to a much-improved Lancaster

The men's lacrosse team suffered an agonisingly close defeat in what was certainly one of the most shocking results of the Roses weekend

Women's lacrosse storm past Lancaster

York women's lacrosse ended a fantastic season with a win, thrashing Lancaster yet again at this year's Roses

Women's indoor firsts lose out to Lancaster

The women's indoor football firsts suffered a disappointing defeat against Lancaster during one of the early fixtures on the Saturday of Roses

Lancaster edge York men's hockey firsts in thriller

York College Select mauled by Lancaster rivals

Lack of experience playing as a team cost York as they were beaten 5-1 by Lancaster

Men's thirds suffer defeat at the hands of Lancaster

York's men's football firsts were outclassed in Roses this year in a 4-2 defeat, despite a spirited performance by the White Rose against a much stronger side.

Double defeat for women's indoor hockey sides

There was no joy for York's women in Friday's indoor hockey fixtures, with the firsts falling to a narrow 4-2 defeat.

Indoor seconds romp to Roses victory

The White Rose got a busy hockey schedule off to the perfect start on Friday afternoon with a comprehensive 6-3 victory in the first of the indoor matches.

Unlucky seconds undone by Lancaster

UYAFC seconds had no luck as they were the better side, but found themselves on the wrong end of a 3-0 defeat at Roses

Resilient York suffer Roses defeat

There is always a feeling of inevitability about losing an away Roses. It was no different for York away at Lancaster in this year's tournament

Women's water polo thrash Lancaster

York's women's water polo team ended their season in style, recording a 9-2 thrashing of their Red Rose opponents on Saturday night.

York snatch historic basketball win

York men's basketball pulled off the shock of the tournament with a scintillating victory over Lancaster

Lancaster foxtrot to victory

Lancaster dominated the ballroom dancing on the final day of this year's Roses tournament

Lancaster dismantle White Rose

In the final football fixture of Roses 2014, the women's firsts team were humbled by their Lancaster counterparts

White Rose rugby firsts scrape victory

On a tough day for UYRUFC, the men's firsts XV battled their way to a crucial victory on Saturday afternoon

Men's water polo edge out Lancaster

An epic Saturday night clash saw York's men's water polo team cap a successful night in the pool for the White Rose, edging a captivating encounter 8-7.

Clinical White Rose claim victory

The men's indoor hockey firsts put in a brilliant performance to overcome Lancaster at Roses

York bowlers tear through Lancaster

York men's firsts cricket team beat their Lancaster counterparts by just four runs, despite a disappointing batting display during which they were bowled out for 110.

There and back again: A Roses tale

Beth Jakubowski looks back at the Roses 2014 weekend, in which York lost their grip on the Carter James trophy after being beaten by fierce rivals Lancaster

Defiant York suffer away Roses defeat

The fiftieth annual Roses tournament, this year held in Lancaster, celebrating the historic rivalry between Yorkshire and Lancashire has culminated in a victory for the home side by 41 points.

Bew braces salvages deserved draw for York

A clinical brace from front-man Josh Bew capped off a swashbuckling second-half performance on Friday

Indoor seconds crash out to clinical Lancaster

Despite opening the scoring in the first minute, York crashed out of the women's indoor football seconds match 5-2 against a more determined Lancaster outfit.

York lose Roses 2014

Lancaster have won the Carter-James Trophy in the 2014 Roses tournament
